name: This MiniPlanet its mine
description:
hello, this is my first gamejam and I ran out of time :(.

you must buy upgrades to combat aliens, using matter obtained when you kill them.
purchases are made by clicking on the sprites. if the shop is open.

instructions for the shop are in Game, Shop power ups exlained in "SCREENSHOOT". Thx Tiger_j.

"(only the purchases on the left work, sorry)"

Turn FullScreen 

Controls:                                                                            
A,D : left, right.                       
W,S: jetpack or fall
Mouse: shoot
E: interact
